actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Resolution relating to the publication of population, economic, and social statistics for Philippine Americans.

summary.text: Directs the Department of Labor in cooperation with the Bureau of Census to immediately begin to undertake the collection and compilation of data in order to provide for the monthly publication by the Bureau of Labor Statistics, beginning no later than January, 1975, of the nationwide population and unemployment rate among Philippine-Americans; and that the Bureau of the Department of Labor and the Department of Agriculture undertake further efforts to collect and publish regularly statistics which provide indicators of the social and economic condition of Philippine-Americans in urban and rural America.

titles.title: Resolution relating to the publication of population, economic, and social statistics for Philippine Americans.
